articles.author: RT
articles.title: ‘More data needed’: Top health officials reportedly urge White House to ‘follow science’ & DELAY vaccine booster plans - RT
articles.description: Top US health officials have called on the White House to pump the brakes on plans to administer Covid vaccine booster shots to millions of Americans later this month, pointing to insufficient data, according to multiple reports.
articles.content: While President Joe Biden’s administration already moved ahead with its booster announcement last month – with Biden stating that all American adults should receive a third dose within eight months o… [+3367 chars]

articles.author: Lexi Lonas
articles.title: American Airlines changes special leave policy for unvaccinated staff | TheHill - The Hill
articles.description: American Airlines said in a statement Thursday that unvaccinated staff must use their own sick days if they catch the coronavirus, ending the special pandemic leave for the company's demographic.
articles.content:
American Airlines said in a statement Thursday that unvaccinated staff must use their own sick days if they catch the coronavirus, ending the special pandemic leave for the company's demographic.
